Class PhishTank

java.lang.Object
  PhishTank

 class PhishTank
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the methods used to fetch information from PhishTank.

          Downloads the fresh XML and updates the lock.

Constructor Detail

PhishTank

PhishTank()
Method Detail

cache

private static void cache()
Downloads the fresh XML and updates the lock. Automatically creates the config/ directory Thanks:http://schmidt.devlib.org/java/file-download.html

getData

private static org.w3c.dom.Document getData(java.lang.String isTest,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<URIBox> checkBoxes)
Tries to find an up-to-date cached version of the PhishTank XML. It downloads and caches the online version.

Parameters:
isTest - Describes the location of test script while in test mode NULL in other cases
checkBoxes - Output parameter
Returns:
Document object representing the document to parse or NULL if an error occured.

getPhishTank

public static java.util.ArrayList<URIBox> getPhishTank(java.lang.String isTest)
Loads all the PhishTank XML data of the online, valid phishing sites, and put the first 10 into the checkBoxes ArrayList
